alert.note: Alert for Clay; Early; Randolph (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 8:24PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Henry, Clay, southwestern Randolph and northwestern Early Counties through 915 PM EDT/815 PM CDT/... At 824 PM EDT/724 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Blakely, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Gaines, Bellville, Bluffton, Harrisons Mill, Barnes, Zetto, Carnegie, Hayes, Pecan, Ferrell Crossroads, Coleman, Jones Crossing, Bethel, Kolomoki Mounds Sp, Suttons Corner and Fort Gaines-Clay Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
